Package edu.temple.cis.paystation

Class Alternating1RateStrategy

java.lang.Object
edu.temple.cis.paystation.Alternating1RateStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
RateStrategy
public class Alternating1RateStrategy extends Object implements RateStrategy
Alternating 1 Rate Strategy Class that implements RateStrategy This rate implements: Linear 1 Rate on the weekdays, and Progressive Rate on the weekends
